title: PSA?: Does Adaptive Helm work against Kog Maw's On-Hit damage?
body:
I'm like, 90% sure this works... And since Kog Maw can be really annoying with his on-hit damage I thought I should share this.

**_Edit: Now that I have legit confirmation on this I'm going to create a separate post as a straight-up PSA. Thanks for contributing here and instead of reviving this thread with comments I recommend contributing on the other one linked here:_**

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/pmQlcBuT-psa-adaptive-helm-counters-on-hit-marksmens-effects

replies.body:
yes it does.

it even also reduces Corkis aa damage
Hot damn, sleeper-OP counter build. I bet most other people playing at low ELO don't know about this!
Upvoted for playing off of my tone. Good delivery, I like your sense of humor. <3

> sleeper

adaptive helm was built against kog'maw at worlds pretty much every time he was picked.

In lower ELO's it is a more complicated strategy than most casual players would think to use. Building a MR item against a marksman is counter-intuitive, hence why I thought it would be uncommon and sleeper OP in lower ELOs.
Yes, that's the only reason you'll see tanks and brusiers get it in pro games.
